Conducted project

In 2022, grouped team C'name, App development team in PathFinder project, project experiencing future jobs.

This is the Youtube channel that you can check our make up videos.

In this project, I participate in the stance of front-end developer.

To do my job, I used AndroidStudio with the language JAVA.

It is quite simmilar with the web programing using python.

Additonally, to make easy style previews, I also used Adobe XD just like the picture.

Based on it's design, Adobe XD offers java codes for AndroidStudio.

However, it has some error and missings, such as responsiveness, I spent much time correcting it.
